Comprehensive_Course.title: Comprehensive Crash Course
Comprehensive_Course.description: For students who want complete preparation for their IGCSE subject—from concepts to final exam readiness.
key_features: 3 Month Crash Course covering full syllabus, revision, and exam prep
Full SASS Access with Performance Tracking, Notes & Quizzes
Live Classes with Recordings for flexible learning
Access to Multiple Workshops including Exam Strategy, Past Paper Practice, Subject-Specific Support & Academic Counseling

key_features: 6 Week Intensive Crash Course for rapid syllabus coverage and focused exam prep
Full SASS Access with Performance Tracking, Notes & Quizzes
Live Classes with Recordings for flexible learning
Access to Targeted Workshops focused on Revision, Concept Gaps, Exam Strategy & Last-Minute Reinforcement

SAT_Mastery_Course.title: SAT Mastery Course
SAT_Mastery_Course.description: For students aiming for top scores with a complete 2-month plan covering every section of the SAT.
key_features: 2 Month Course covering all SAT sections, strategies, and full-length exam practice
Full Access to SASS for Practice Tests, Notes & Targeted Quizzes
Full-Length Proctored Mock Practice tests
Access to SAT Workshops including Test Strategy, Time Management & Section-Wise Review

SAT_Express_Prep.title: SAT Express Course
SAT_Express_Prep.description: A high-intensity SAT bootcamp for quick improvement, smarter techniques, and confident test-day performance.

Full Access to SASS for Practice Tests, Notes & Targeted Quizzes
Full-Length Proctored Mock Practice tests
Access to SAT Workshops including Test Strategy, Time Management & Section-Wise Review
